text: I tak dali My znat' o nikh, chtoby oni uznali, chto obeshchaniye Allakha - istina i chto chas - net somneniya v nem! Vot oni razoshlis' mezhdu soboy v ikh dele i skazali: "Postroyte nad nimi sooruzheniye. Ikh Gospod' luchshe znayet pro nikh". Skazali te, kotoryye derzhali verkh v ikh dele: "Ustroim my nad nimi mechet'
